rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0001
rows.name: They found an alien mech?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0002
rows.name:
Yeah. Looks like it belongs to an unknown species.
It's a type we've never seen before.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0003
rows.name:
Apparently it seems abandoned.
I want to recover it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0004
rows.name: That's a story that stirs a mechanic's blood![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0005
rows.name: Right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0006
rows.name: It's located here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0007
rows.name:
Deep in Nightglow Forest[ST:wide ]―
So that's why Lu was called.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0008
rows.name: Exactly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0008_2
rows.name:
What's concerning is, it seems Growth is also
after this thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0009
rows.name:
Observing the FrontierNet readings,
it looks like they've already failed to recover it many times.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0010
rows.name:
That figures.
Even I can't get close to that place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0011
rows.name: There must be some special reason.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0012
rows.name: Yes. Praedo inhabit that land.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0013
rows.name: Seems like these guys are the cause.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0014
rows.name: We didn't see them when we went to Nightglow Forest before.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0015
rows.name:
Yes. These creatures only live in a very small part,
deep within the forest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0016
rows.name:
And that place has already
stopped being what you'd call a forest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0017
rows.name: Why's that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0018
rows.name:
These creatures devour
all life forms other than themselves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0019
rows.name:
Th-Then
will Tatsu get eaten too, meh!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0020
rows.name: Yes, after a few minutes not even bones will remain.

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0021
rows.name:
As the old saying goes,
[System:Ruby rt=Leaving no trace behind ]'A departing bird leaves no trace'.[/System:Ruby][ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0022
rows.name:
I see. So that's why Growth
keeps failing, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0023
rows.name: But if that information is accurate, that's convenient for us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0024
rows.name: True, since our bodies are B.B.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0025
rows.name:
Looks like we might be overlooked
even by Praedo, who react to life forms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0026
rows.name: I understand the circumstances, but[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0027
rows.name: You've already reported this to Commander Vandham, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0028
rows.name:
The top priority mission
is supposed to be searching for the Life Point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0029
rows.name:
Even putting that aside,
is recovering this mech that urgent?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0030
rows.name: Of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0031
rows.name:
I came because Commander Vandham told me
to have Elma's team help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0032
rows.name: Like Elma says, we don't have time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0033
rows.name:
Finding the Life Point is the top priority,
no doubt, but[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0034
rows.name: But now, the existence of hostile forces has become clear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0035
rows.name:
Plus, they seem to be part of
the group that attacked Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0036
rows.name:
And now those guys are desperate
to secure this mech.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0037
rows.name: Does it mean it's an extremely important thing to them?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0038
rows.name:
What if this thing is a secret weapon
that could annihilate us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0039
rows.name: That seems like a bit of a leap, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0040
rows.name: Alright.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0041
rows.name:
Regardless of what it is,
the fewer threats, the better.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0042
rows.name: Count us in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0042_2
rows.name: Any objections?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0043
rows.name: No, ma'am![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0044
rows.name: Alright, it's settled![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0045
rows.name: But if we're going to take this on, we'll need to keep it quick.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0046
rows.name: Understood.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0047
rows.name: Lu-san and Tatsu, you stay here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0048
rows.name: Unlike us, you'll be targeted by Praedo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0049
rows.name: Ohh, thank you for your consideration.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0050
rows.name: Lin-san, you do care about Tatsu after all, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0051
rows.name:
Of course!
Since I've been steadily fattening you up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0052
rows.name:
I can't stand the thought of Praedo
eating you first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0053
rows.name: Meh-meh-meh-meh![ST:wait ]
